item.description:
Update, I found a volunteer and runner for my team.  If you're interested in volunteering or starting up a team of your own check out this link

http://www.botpp.org/events/event-registration/tornado-alley-50-mile-relay-6-2-12/

 

I'm looking for 1 volunteer and 1 runner to join my 56 mile Tornado Relay team on 6/2. Relay is to raise money for victims of last years tornado. Begins in Monson and ends in Charlton. We're looking for someone to run 3 legs. Leg 1=3 miles Leg 2=1.9 Leg 3=1.9 There are 5 runners in between each leg so you'll have plenty of time to rest in between.
item.name: Tornado Relay
